translations: 关键，症结；难题；十字架形，坩埚

sentences.sentence: Now we come to the crux of the matter.
sentences.translation: 现在我们来谈问题的症结。

sentences.sentence: He said the crux of the matter was economic policy.
sentences.translation: 他说该问题的症结在于经济政策。

sentences.sentence: This is the crux of the matter.
sentences.translation: 这就是问题的关键所在。
